title: Deception
description: In this Dateline classic, a young sister and brother are torn apart when their mother disappears, and an elaborate sting operation traps a most unlikely villain. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on June 14, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
